property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.address
property.description: In Server specified the port that Resource Manager will runn on. In client is used for connecting to Resource Manager

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address
property.description: Utilized by Node Manager for communication with Resource Manager

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.address
property.description: Utilized by Application Masters to communicate with Resource Manager; in our case for MRAppMaster (MapReduce Application Master) to communicate with Resource Manager

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.admin.address
property.description: Utilized by administrative clients ($yarn rmadmin) to communicate with Resource Manager

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs
property.description: Comma separated list of directories, where local data is persisted by Node Manager

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.aux-services
property.description: Long running service which executes on Node Manager(s) and provides MapReduce Sort and Shuffle functionality.

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation-enable
property.description: Enable log aggregation so application logs are moved onto hdfs and are viewable via web ui after the application completed. The default location on hdfs is '/log' and can be changed via yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir property

property.name: hadoop.security.authorization
property.description: Disable authorization fo development and clusters that do not require security
